name: F1
details:
Guitar Preamp PedalAMT Electronics Legend Amps Series pedals capture warm, rich and natural tones of the most sought-after classic and modern guitar tube amplifiers! The F1 emulates the sounds a Fender Twin tube guitar amp:  from crystal clean to slightly overdriven.
AMT Electronics Legend Amps Series Pedals are designed to work seamlessly in studio or live. Each pedal can be operated as:
a single channel guitar preamp, being connected to an external guitar power amplifier or to a guitar head's/combo's internal power amplifier (via "Power Amp In", "Line In" or "Return" jacks)
an amplifier and cabinet emulator – "Amp in a Box", being connected directly to an audio interface or a mixing console
